explains: n. 面包师，糕点师；专用轻便烤箱；面包店（=baker's）

sentences.en: Mr. Baker would take command of the campaign.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生将负责这次运动。

sentences.en: Nick Faldo was beaten by Peter Baker in a playoff.
sentences.cn: 尼克·福尔多在加时赛中被彼得·贝克击败。

sentences.en: Baker was smoothing out differences with European allies.
sentences.cn: 贝克尔正在解决与欧洲盟友的分歧。
